query.prompt:
This text is written in Japanese. Create a word table showing the Lemma for each word. The entries in the table are Word, Kana (Word), Roman (Word), Lemma, Kana (Lemma), Roman (Lemma), Part of Speech and Note.
* Leave blank if not applicable. * The Note should be writtern in brief, e.g. archaic. * Quotation marks should be excluded.
1 我が人生の半ばにして 9 そこで私が見た他のことについて語ろう 28 少しの間、疲れた体を休めた後、 67 彼は私に答えた。「私は人間ではない、かつては人間だったが、
